english.segment1: (Verse). Your love is relentless. And I'm glad for it, I'm glad for it. Your love is relentless. I am glad
english.segment2: Your love is relentless. And if not for it, if not for it. I'd perish for sure. If not for it
english.segment3: (Pre-Chorus). Savior for the faithful. We're in the hands of God
english.segment4: (Chorus). Love has come. And we are safe. Hope has come. And we are safe
english.segment5: (Bridge). We're in the hands of God, yea.. We're in the hands of God, yea..
